subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: World heavyweight champion Oleg Maskaev's life has been a wild ride, from a childhood in Kazakhstan, to the Sacramento suburbs, and now back to Moscow where he will defend his title against Peter Okhello on Sunday.
snippet: World heavyweight champion Oleg Maskaev's life has been a wild ride, from a childhood in Kazakhstan, to the Sacramento suburbs, and now back to Moscow where he will defend his title against Peter Okhello on Sunday.
